name: DuckDuckGo two columns (not maintained)
description: Simple style for DuckDuckGo results in two column layout.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.

additional_info:
19/03/2014 tested with a number of userscripts. The 'YouTube Sort by date' userscript lists results in columns for several sites and obviously for this style to make sense you might want to change line 183 to 
list.style.setProperty("width", "100%", "important");
and delete line 182 for that matter, or delete the whole duckduckgo block, to allow the css to do its work when the page size changes.
